Pre-Game Insights: Shivam Dube is under pressure to come good as the spin enforcer
Bangladesh's batters have rarely given their attack a cushion in the tournament
India are deriving the joys of having a fully-fit Hardik Pandya giving them the flexibility needed to play either a third seamer or a third spinner in Kuldeep Yadav
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played on June 22, 2024, at the Sir Vivian Richards Stadium
India have relied on Suryakumar Yadav to steer them out of a wobble twice in two games
Rohit Sharma has been dismissed nine times by left-arm quicks in all T20s in 2024
Others: Rohit Sharma has a good record against Mustafizur: 122 runs in 72 balls in all T20s at a strike rate of 169.44
Shakib is one wicket away from becoming the first player to pick up 50 in T20 World Cups
Arshdeep Singh is already India's joint-third-highest wicket-taker in the tournament behind R Ashwin and Jadeja and alongside Hardik, with 20 wickets at a strike rate of 10.8
